description: Generic tap for RSS and Atom feeds
label: Feed
name: feed

settings.name: feed_urls
settings.label: Feed Urls
settings.description: A list of one or more feed paths.

settings.name: feed_fields
settings.label: Feed Fields
settings.description: A list of feed level data fields to capture.

settings.name: feed_entry_fields
settings.label: Feed Entry Fields
settings.description: A list of entry level data fields to capture.

settings.name: feed_entry_replication_key
settings.label: Feed Entry Replication Key
settings.description: The field used to determine new records, typically 'published' or 'updated'.

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: The earliest record date to sync.
